title: For Sale:  Surefire M500a
postcontent: Used but both lights work. Came on a police trade in carbine. Can be shipped. The SureFire M500A WeaponLight replaces the original carbine handguards. It features a 9-volt shock-isolated incandescent lamp with a 1.62" reflector suited to close- to medium-range applications, and two low-output navigation lights available in white, red, or blue. The M500A has three primary beam switches integrated into the forend: a constant-on rocker switch (left side), a momentary-on pressure pad switch (right side), and a system-disable rotary switch (rear of battery housing) that locks all lights in the OFF position to prevent accidental activation during covert operations, transport, or storage. The navigation lights are operated by a smaller momentary-on pressure pad switch (left side). Proven in combat, used by military and law-enforcement around the world.  Technical Information   Fits: Carbine (short handguard) Bulb: Primay - Xenon; Secondary - LED Light Output: 225 lumens with MN11 lamp; 125 with MN10 lamp Run Time: 1 hour with MN10, 20 minutes with MN11 Battery: 2 - CR123A included Material: Aerospace Aluminum Length: Weight: 1.4 pounds Color: Black

title: For Sale:  Ruger SR22 Talo Edition Upgraded with Extras
postcontent: For sale is my Ruger SR22 Pistol Talo Special Edition .22lr pistol. It has been well cared for and has approximately 500 rounds fired through it. It is probably the most reliable compact autoloader I have ever owned, firing everything from Sniper Sub-Sonic to Velocitors, without a hitch. The Talo Special Edition here is the black slide/barrel with three magazines. I have upgraded the front sight to a hi-viz and have the other two color inserts still if you want to change them, as well as the guide rod and spring which is now a Tandemkross enclosed steel one (original included, which was plastic). Also includes: All the original box, manuals, magazine plates, thin grip change, 1 extra Ruger Magazine (for a total of 4), 2x Tandemkross +5 magazine bumpers (which make two of the magazine 15 rounders!), A nylon double pistol case with front pouch, A Ring's Blue Training Gun (great for retention training, a well as drawing indoors or around family), Fobus Paddle OWB Holster, Kydex IWB holster, Remora pocket holster with pocket magazine pouch (not pictured), a Maxpedition JK-1 CCW pouch (not pictured), and Blackhawk (I believe) magazine belt pouch. I am asking for $450 for it all. This gun is well maintained, kept clean, and some of the stuff is like new.I might trade this for a good or better condition Ruger 22/45 Mark 3/4, a Ruger Single Ten .22lr or a Single Six Convertable .22wmr/.22lr, a Ruger Sp101 in .22lr, a Ruger 10/22 take down with 16' barrel, a Ruger new model Charger, a S&W Victory .22lr, a S&W M63 .22lr, a Marlin Papoose stainless, or a Henry Mare's leg .22lr but those are the only guns I am looking for right now. This gun is just a little small for me for my POU , and I am looking for a larger .22lr for hunting. Cash & or extras can make up the difference on your end, cash on my for the right trade.Must be willing to meet at Bass Pro Shops in Independence, MO to purchase it from me, showing a Missouri issued photo ID of yourself and filling out a bill of sale. Alternatively we can do an FFL transfer on YOUR dime. LOCAL buyers only, I do not ship firearms. I will entertain reasonable offers but please do not waste your time lowballing me, I do not NEED to sell it. Feel free to ask any real questions you may have and thanks for looking!
